attributes.action: Cease funding £35.59 a week & housing  for failed asylum seekers in The UK
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.gov.uk/asylum-support/what-youll-get

Check out The Govt website to see what asylum seekers get. No wonder they are landing their boats on our shores.
attributes.background: The government house and pay weekly payments to both successful & failed asylum seekers. This is wrong. A huge drain on our country & these homes and payments should be given to aid our own homeless, especially veterans.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

People who are found to be in the country illegally are not entitled to Government support, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
